content.text:
Here is the memo referring unresolved customer grievances:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: Customer Service Escalations Team, Technical Support Department, Billing Department
From: [Your Name], Senior Customer Service Representative
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Referral of Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Please be advised that the following customer grievances remain unresolved after initial troubleshooting and require further investigation by the designated departments:

[Ticket #12345] Customer reports ongoing technical issues with product X. Referred to Technical Support for in-depth troubleshooting and potential replacement.
[Ticket #23456] Customer disputes charges on their recent invoice. Referred to Billing to review the account and make necessary adjustments.
[Ticket #34567] Customer expresses dissatisfaction with the resolution provided. Referred to the Escalations Team for review and to determine appropriate remedial actions.

Please investigate these matters thoroughly and update the ticket with your findings and proposed resolutions. Keep the customer informed of the progress on their case. Notify me if you require any additional information from the customer to assist your investigation.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these unresolved customer grievances. Providing timely and satisfactory resolutions is a top priority for our Customer Service team.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
